entry.title: Change theme in octopress
entry.content:
Select your theme from this page and install it like this:

git clone git://github.com/tommy351/Octopress-Theme-Slash.git .themes/slash rake install\['slash'\] rake generate

entry.title: Get started with octopress in github in a few minutes.
entry.content:
Octopress is a great blog framework. One can start blogging in a few minutes using the github for the static pages/posts hosting.

git clone git://github.com/imathis/octopress.git octopress cd octopress/ bundle install rake install rake setup_github_pages rake generate rake deploy
